name: The 7th International Conference on Life Science and Biological Engineering
content: The 7th International Conference on Life Science and Biological Engineering (LSBE) is an international platform for scholars, researchers, and practitioners to discuss interdisciplinary research and practices in the fields of Life Science, Biological Engineering and more. 2019 LSBE will take place from December 17-19, 2019 in Kyoto, Japan. Prospective authors are invited to submit original research abstracts or full papers which have not been submitted/published/under consideration in other conferences and journals.
